title: King Crimson-3 Shows-avi-mp3-flac 1982-'84 (killer)
description:
Hi All,
  I meant to get this done sooner, but here are 3 fantastic shows from KC that are my alltime favorites from 1982-1984. I&#039;m not adding a couple of others yet, Live In Japan and Absent Lovers, but I think those are already covered on TPB. These however are not and they are KILLER. I love &#039;em 
  There are 3 different file types for this, 1 for each concert covering video and audio. All artwork is included except for the avi concert Live In Frejus. I added a copy of the ticket that was used for the Mpls, MN. concert that I had the pleasure of being at. A total blast indeed!

Some stuff that&#039;s included in the download......
